testcase.classname: CRUD - Create, Read, Update and Delete
testcase.name: Create and Delete existing computer details
testcase.system-out: Given I open the page url "computer-db".....................................passed Then I validate the "page title" in home page...............................passed When I click on "create new computer" button from the home page.............passed Then I validate the "page title" in create page.............................passed When I create a new machine.................................................passed Then I validate the "newly created computer" in filter page.................passed When I click on "machine" link from the home page...........................passed And I click on "delete this computer" button from the create page...........passed Then I validate the "deleted computer details" in filter page...............passed

testcase.classname: CRUD - Create, Read, Update and Delete
testcase.name: Read and Update existing computer details
testcase.system-out: Given I open the page url "computer-db".....................................passed Then I validate the "page title" in home page...............................passed When I click on "create new computer" button from the home page.............passed Then I validate the "page title" in create page.............................passed When I create a new machine.................................................passed Then I validate the "newly created computer" in filter page.................passed When I click on "machine" link from the home page...........................passed And I enter "updated name" in the "Computer update name" field..............passed And I click on "save this computer" button from the create page.............passed Then I validate the "updated computer details" in filter page...............passed
